system.description:
You think, therefore you are … and your problems’ days are numbered. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can always choose to use your Intelligence score instead of another ability score when calculating your weapon attack and damage bonuses. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.bazelk1nkecht9lr]{Assess Vulnerability} trick, you can replace it with another trick of your choice when you take this feat. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.v4pkjilh484jph6i]{Precision Strikes} feature, when using it, instead of it applying your Intelligence modifier on attack and damage rolls (redundantly with this feat) you gain an expertise die on the attack instead.
  • You gain the following feature:

Think Twice

Whenever you make a Skill check using Intelligence, you can choose one of the following options:

  • The stimulation of the mental challenge refreshes you. You are healed for 1d4 hit points.
  • You can simultaneously make another skill check that also uses Intelligence as part of the same action.
  • You can roll the check with advantage.

Once you have used this feature a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1), you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
